verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H8147>me,<s%> and behold, two <S%H1736>baskets<s%> of <S%H8384>figs<s%> <S%H3259>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> with the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and <S%H4525>smiths,<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and had <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> like the <S%H8384>figs<s%> that are <S%H1073>first-ripe;<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1731>basket<s%> had <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>bad<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> which could not be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> they were so <S%H7455>bad.<s%>

Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> What do you see, <S%H3414>Jeremiah?<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8384>Figs;<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> and the <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>bad,<s%> that <S%H398>can't<s%> be eaten, they are so <S%H7455>bad.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> Like these <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> so will I <S%H5234>regard<s%> the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> whom I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> out of this <S%H4725>place<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> for <S%H2896>good.<s%>

For I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on them for <S%H2896>good,<s%> and I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> to this <S%H776>land:<s%> and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H2040>them,<s%> and not pull them down; and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H5428>them,<s%> and not pluck them up.

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> that I am Yahweh: and they shall be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God;<s%> for they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to me with their whole <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

As the <S%H7451>bad<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> which <S%H398>can't<s%> be eaten, they are so <S%H7455>bad,<s%> surely thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> So will I <S%H5414>give<s%> up <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> who <S%H7604>remain<s%> in this <S%H776>land,<s%> and those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

I will even <S%H5414>give<s%> them up to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> back and forth among all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H7451>evil;<s%> to be a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> a <S%H8148>taunt<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> in all <S%H4725>places<s%> where I shall drive <S%H5080>them.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> among <S%H8552>them,<s%> until they be consumed from off the <S%H127>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them and to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
